newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Oklahoma feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Oklahoma feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.

text.p: USDA said trade was slow in the panhandle area late Wednesday. Limited test on slaughter steers and heifers closed steady.

Feedlots reported light to moderate inquiry from buyers. Heifers weighing under 1050 lbs continue to find limited demand and discounts. Sales reported on 600 slaughter steers and 1,300 heifers; 81,000 head confirmed for the week to date which includes 15,000 formulated cattle and 1,900 previously contracted cattle to be shipped this week.
Wk to Date: 81,000 Week Ago: 95,900 Year Ago: 64,400
